tool_description: The Uncovered Treasure API has more than 25,000 revealed truths from every Book and chapter in the Bible as recorded by Phil Largent over the last 25 years.
name: Uncovered Treasure
title: Uncovered Treasure

api_list.name: /random

results.text: It is true that one day every knee will bow to God and every tongue confess that God is right-righteous.

api_list.name: /verse/{verse}

required_parameters.name: verse
required_parameters.description: Use common English name with chapter number and optionally verse, such as "1 Corinthians 1", "1 Corinthians 1:5" or "James 3". Does NOT support ranged searches, such as "James 3:1-4".

results.text: God 'sends' some as mobile or itinerate ministers and others as stationary ministers in fulfilling His assignments or purposes.
Sometimes the Holy Spirit reveals difficulties believers are going to counter before the difficulties arrive.
Sometimes the Holy Spirit speaks to and gives directions to believers through other believers being led by the Spirit.
Believers, even spiritual leaders, must not to be dissuaded by loving friends from doing what they believe in their heart is God's will for them.

api_list.name: /search/{searchterm}
api_list.description: Search for treasure by term, e.g. "wisdom"

api_list.name: /today

results.text: Disregard for God and His Word have consequences.

api_list.name: /topic/{topic}
api_list.description: Get entries from a specific topic
